english.segment1: Neon lights flickering. Outside the cafe. Ice on the windshield. Stars in a black sea. On a winter road. Flurries of snow. I'm ready to go
english.segment2: Past farmhouse and pasture. Our voices together. Rise to the drumming. Of big-rigs and trailers. Long hours to daylight. A rumbling bus. Our bed and our board
english.segment3: Heavenly Father. Remember the traveler. Bring us safely home. Heavenly Father. Remember the traveler. Bring us safely home. Safely home
english.segment4: In the towns off this highway. The people are kind. They welcome us in. I sing in their church halls. Old hymns and prayer songs. With lifted hearts. We rejoice in the Lord
english.segment5: Heavenly Father. Remember the traveler. Bring us safely home. Heavenly Father. Remember the traveler. Bring us safely home. Safely home
english.segment6: I long for my family. And friends to remind me. Of where I have been. And where I am going. And where I come from
english.segment7: Heavenly Father. Remember the traveler. Bring us safely home. Heavenly Father. Remember the traveler. Bring us safely home. Safely home
